name: Bukidami Mountain
description:
A fun puzzle-platformer game about a village man exploring a mysterious mountain, full of puzzles and traps, called Bukidami Mountain.

HOW TO PLAY   

Keyboard:

- Left and Right Arrows: Walk
- Space: Jump
- Z: Use ability
- X: Interact
- ESC: Menu

Xbox Control:

 - Left Analog Stick or Arrows: Menu selection/Walk
- A: Confirm/Jump
- X: Use ability
- B: Back/Interact
- Start: Menu

RECOMMENDED REQUIREMENTS

- Intel Atom 1.6GHz or better.
- 1GB RAM or better.
- At least 70MB of free disk space in Windows or 100MB for Linux.
